DOC.detailed_description: Treatment-naïve patient randomly assign 1:1 ratio 48 week double-blind treatment subcutaneous , once-weekly injection 180 μg peginterferon alfa-2a ( 40KD ) plus either twice-daily oral ribavirin ( 600 1000mg/day ) placebo .
